short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Job Postings to Your Seekario Application Hub

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seekario.ai - Simplify Your Job Search with Seamless Integration!

Experience a hassle-free job search process by importing job listings to your Seekario hub. Say goodbye to manual copy-and-paste tasks and hello to a streamlined approach.

üöÄ Key Features:

Seamless Integration: Import job listings from popular websites like Indeed.com, Seek.com.au, and LinkedIn.com directly to your Seekario.ai application hub.

Time-Saving Automation: Bid farewell to tedious copy-and-paste tasks. With a single click, your desired job opportunities are automatically added to your Seekario.ai dashboard.

üõ†Ô∏è How to Use:

Install the Seekario.ai extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Log in using your Seekario.ai account email address and the provided access code (find it on your account page).
Navigate to your preferred job search website (Indeed.com, Seek.com.au, LinkedIn.com).
Spot a job posting you're interested in.
Click the "Add to Seekario" button in your browser.
Witness the magic as your job posting seamlessly integrates into your Seekario.ai application hub!

üìß Questions or Feedback?

Contact us at support@seekario.ai. We're here to assist you!

Happy job hunting!
